rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall with a vestibule incorporating Vastu principles for energy flow.

rooms.name: Living Area
rooms.description: An open-concept living space that merges with the dining area, ensuring natural light and good feng shui alignment.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: A spacious dining room adjacent to the kitchen, designed for social gatherings and proper energy distribution according to Vastu.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern luxury kitchen with efficient workflow layout aligning with positive directional flow (south-east corner recommended by Vastu).

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A private master bedroom on the split-level featuring natural light and calm aesthetics following Vastu alignment.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy guest room ensuring privacy and quietness with energy-boosting design.

rooms.name: Bathroom (attached to master bedroom)
rooms.description: Well-appointed bathroom placed strategically to maintain privacy and adhere to Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: Large windows for ample natural light and ventilation.
Access to the garden area ensuring a connection with nature.

openings.location: Between living area and split-level section
openings.description: A staircase connecting ground floor to upper level of the studio apartment.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: A fully-equipped private gym space with sound insulation and ample natural light for a luxurious fitness experience.

rooms.name: Study/Workspace
rooms.description: A dedicated study area optimized for productivity and aligned with Vastu principles for creativity.

rooms.name: Balcony Terrace
rooms.description: An outdoor terrace overlooking the garden providing relaxation space following traditional design norms.

openings.description: Large windows to maximize natural light and ventilation in functional spaces.

openings.location: Upper floor transition from living area
openings.description: A secondary staircase for ease of movement between levels, ensuring accessibility and safety.

rooms.name: Garden Courtyard
rooms.description: A large garden area integrating indigenous landscaping with modern design for a peaceful outdoor living space.

openings.description: A main entrance to the garden designed with local architectural elements and security considerations.
